reviewText: Official Do Some Magic "Party Magic" trailer, starring Matt & Peter Wood

Hosts Matt and Peter Wood de-mystify some classics tricks and show how easy it is to "Do Some Magic." I wish I had known a few "Party Magic" tricks when I was in college. It would have made breaking the ice in a new crowd a lot easier. There are eleven tricks performed and explained on the DVD. Some tricks require special (inexpensive) props, but most are ones you can do with everyday objects - plastic cups, regular cards, envelops, etc. It's a great introduction for newbies and hobby magicians. Also check out "Table Magic" Table Magic
